member.name: M:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Styles.WellPointStyle.DrawSampleCore(ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Drawing.GeoCanvas,ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Shapes.DrawingRectangleF)
member.summary: This method draws a sample feature on the canvas you provided.
member.remarks:
This virtual method is called from the concrete public method Draw. In this method, we draw a sample style on the canvas you provided. This is typically used to display a legend or other sample area.
When implementing this virtual method, consider the canvas size and draw the sample image appropriately. You should keep in mind that the sample typically shows up on a legend.
member.exception: If you pass a null as the canvas, we will throw an ArgumentNullException.
In the event you attempt to call this method when the GeoCanvas's IsDrawing mode is false, it will throw an InvalidOperationException.
member.param: This parameter represents the canvas you want to draw the features on.
